allow: Bash(python -c "import urllib.request, ssl; ctx = ssl.create_default_context\(\); ctx.check_hostname = False; ctx.verify_mode = ssl.CERT_NONE; req = urllib.request.Request\(''https://pub-guelph.escribemeetings.com/Meeting.aspx?Id=5b29247b-3757-48cf-a510-a9a979085a2e&Agenda=Agenda&lang=English'', headers={''User-Agent'': ''Mozilla/5.0''}\); resp = urllib.request.urlopen\(req, context=ctx\); html = resp.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8''\); print\(html[:8000]\)")
